Text:
Fantastic!
Can't believe that I stumbled upon this

Hello all,
All apologies for the slow seeding, there is a very large bandwidth restriction on my end.  I will be splitting this torrent up into multiple torrents, one per album, in order to smooth the process. 
-s4ppy0ne4l

To my fellow Nirvana fans,
I sincerely regret to announce that I will no longer seed this torrent, as I have split this torrent into several smaller, much more manageable torrents.

In my ignorance and eagerness to share my collection, I neglected to realize the time and resources needed to upload such a file.  I found dividing and conquering is the key.  Please check out the split versions of this torrent.
-http://thepiratebay.sx/user/s4ppy0ne4l/
